Text: Taku Jihofa fu Netan kpe̩ nyʼugbo Defid. Oñ i lewa ka ñw u kakini, One̩ meji jʼewoʼka; oka chʼanana, oka chʼe̩nukpa.
Anana le̩ chene̩ ame̩wño̩re̩ egini kpai amokuno̩ tabale;

e̩nukpa le̩ muda nʼe̩wñ du n, chai igbe̩le̩ ala re oka, e-kʼi la tak i ne̩ gba: i la dʼugbo-wñ anana waa manyʼamo̩ma-wñ; e̩wñ kʼowñ onugo bu tʼalu oñ i adu ñw u je̩, i añmʼomi ef ago-wñ, i la dachi agbe̩do̩-wñ, i dabe̩ne̩ kʼo̩ma-wñ onobule̩ ñw u.

Tak abelo̩naʼka wʼugbo anana le̩. I la ko̩ edu kwef ame̩wño̩re̩ egini kpai amokuno̩ e-wñ kʼi dʼoka-wñ kpa tod abelo̩na kʼi wʼugbo-wñ le̩. I muda mʼo̩mala e-e̩nukpa le̩ du, oñ i mʼu du kpa ñw e̩ne̩ kʼi wʼugbo-wñ le̩.
Tak uwe̩do̩ Defid mutajo nʼe̩ne̩ le̩ oji tabale; oñ i ka ñwu Netan kakini, Oji Jihofa! E̩ne̩ kʼi fʼe̩wñ-i che chebʼuku jo.
E̩ne̩ le̩ la adʼo̩mala le̩ dabi wa ñw u onu me̩le̩ todabu kʼi fʼe̩wñ-i che, kʼi rna la liʼ ejumomi-wñ n.
Taku Ne̩tan ka ñwu Defid kakini, Uwe̩ chʼe̩ne̩ le̩. Abu ku Jihofa, O̩jo̩ abo Israe̩l, ka de̩ kakini, Omi fʼekpo ba tʼuwe̩ oji kʼe̩ jʼonu Israe̩l, omi la gbʼe̩ kwef o̩wo̩ So̩l;
u la dʼunyi odu-we̩ ñw e̩, u la kʼamo̩ya odu-we̩ yamʼagbe̩-do̩-we̩, u laño̩ mʼunyi abo Israe̩l kpai abo Juda ko̩ ñw e̩ ge̩; e-le̩ ma nyarʼe̩, omi ma ño̩ kʼe̩wñ ojoji ojoji manyʼu ñw e̩ ta.

E̩wñ chi kʼuwe̩ che̩de̩te̩ o̩la Jihofa, kʼe̩ la che e̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju-wñ? Uwe̩ nʼo̩kwo̩chageli gwo Uraya e̩ne̩ He̩t le̩ da, e̩ la mʼo̩ya-wñ gba chʼo̩ya e-we̩, o̩kwo̩chageli amo̩ma Amo̩n oñ e̩ ne̩ kpa.
Todule̩ o̩kwo̩chageli ñʼakwo bʼunyi-we̩ te̩ ogbegbele̩ n, todabu kʼe̩ che̩de̩te̩ mi, kʼe̩ la mʼo̩ya Uraya e̩ne̩ He̩t le̩ du chʼo̩ya-we̩.
Abu ku Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Nakʼe̩bie̩ne̩ kwane̩ kwef unyi-we̩ onugo abʼuwe̩ ma; eju-we̩ meji nakʼamo̩ya-we̩ ñw ekeji-we̩, owñ la abʼamo̩ya-we̩ dachi eju olu ki kade-i.
Todu uwe̩ che maja maja; omi muda ache e̩wñ-i eju abo Israe̩l du, kpai eju olu ki kade-i ge̩.
Taku Defid ka ñwu Netan kakini, U fu Jihofa dure me̩! Taku Netan ka ñwu Defid kakini, Jihofa laño̩ mʼadure-we̩ du tinyo̩ me̩; uwe̩ aku n.
Ama todabu kʼuwe̩ bʼuña lile te̩ ñw ame̩nebi Jihofa ku ma chʼakpabie̩-wñ, o̩ma ku ma abi ñw e̩ le̩ aku chuu.
Taku Netan kwʼo̩mo̩ le tʼunyi-wñ.
Todule̩ Defid chane̩ egbo̩ko̩bʼO̩jo̩ todu o̩ma le̩; oñ Defid fʼalu ji, i la nyʼejefu adachi ane̩pe̩te̩ gbogbo ñw o̩jo̩.
Tak abogijo unyi-wñ kwane̩, oñ ma kpe̩nyʼu ku ma dʼu kwane̩ kwʼane̩pe̩te̩; i muda je̩ n, i la jʼuje̩wñ kpai ama n.

Oñ i lewatu o̩jo̩ ekebie-wñ, o̩ma le̩ leku. Oñ abuko̩lo̩ Defid railo eka ñw u kʼo̩ma le̩ leku, todu ma kakini, Go, e̩gba kʼo̩ma le̩ deju, a ko̩la ñw u i la nyʼuwa eti n, ab a ale kʼa ka ñw u ka kʼo̩ma le̩ leku? I neke chʼo̩la-wñ e̩bie̩ne̩.
Defid la li abu kʼabuko̩lo̩-wñ jʼako̩la ye̩ye̩ nyʼomune̩ eti, oñ Defid ma ka kʼo̩ma le̩ leku; taku Defid ka ñw abuko̩lo̩-wñ kakini, O̩ma le̩ leku? Oñ ma kakini, i leku.

Taku Defid kwane̩, i la fʼo̩la gwe̩, oñ i mʼekpo du kuru o̩la-wñ, i la mʼe̩wñ o̩la-wñ gwo jʼane̩, i mʼomune̩ ko nyi; tak i lewʼef unyi Jihofa, oñ i dojikane̩; tak i lewʼunyi e-wñ; oñ e̩gba kʼi tene, ma dʼuje̩wñ gugu o̩gba-wñ, oñ i mʼu du je̩.
Tak abuko̩lo̩-wñ ka ñw u kakini, E-kʼuwe̩ che-i chʼe̩wñ ta? Uwe̩ fʼalu ji, e̩ ño̩ raku o̩ma le̩ e̩gba kʼi deju; e̩gba kʼo̩ma le̩ muda leku, e̩ kwane̩ aje̩ e̩wñ.
Tak i kakini, Abukʼo̩ma le̩ deju, omi jialu, u ño̩ raku; todu u kakini, E̩ne̩ ma, abe̩ku Jihofa ali mi eju, todu kʼo̩ma le̩ kʼi deju?
Fai i la leku, tod e̩wñ najialu? U neke dʼu dabi wa ge̩? Omi anyʼugbo owñ, i muda adabi wʼugbo e-mi ge̩ n.
Taku Defid nyi Batsheba, o̩ya-wñ e̩do̩, oñ i nyʼejefu ugbo-wñ abʼo̩ dachi. I la fʼo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ bi, oñ Defid dʼodu-wñ ko̩ So̩lo̩mo̩n.
Jihofa la lʼedo owñ; oñ i fʼuche̩ kpe̩rʼu lʼo̩wo̩ Netan akache̩ le̩; abe̩le̩ i dʼodu-wñ ko̩ Jedidia todu Jihofa.
Oñ Joab kʼogu bo̩ Raba e-amo̩ma Amo̩n, i la fʼewo onu-ma du.
Taku Joab fʼamonuche̩ kpe̩ru Defid, oñ i kakini, Omi mʼogu kobo̩ Raba; i-i, omi fʼewo omiofo le̩ du me̩.
Todule̩ e̩ mʼamone̩ kibo̩ ko wa jo̩, kʼe̩ ko ma ruru nyu ewo-i kʼe̩ la fʼu du; tode̩gba kʼomi amʼewo-i gba, ku ma dʼodu e-mi mʼo̩.
Taku Defid mʼamone̩ chaka ko wa jo̩, i la nyi Raba, oñ i kogu bʼo, i la mʼu gba.
Tak i mʼike̩be̩ onu abʼewo le̩ chi bʼo̩ oji te̩; uwoji-wñ la chʼo̩jamalia tale̩nt oka, okuta akoko jʼo̩la-wñ; oñ ma mʼu du do Defid oji. Tak i mʼane̩ kʼogu je̩ ko kwef ewo dufu, i nana tabale.

Tak i mʼamone̩ ku ma jʼewo le̩ ko dufu wa, oñ i ko ma jo̩ ñw iso̩ kpai ebije ki ale̩, kpai e̩do̩, oñ i je̩ ñwu ma lale gu ef unyi ugbo ku ma ro̩ otubeli du. Abe̩le̩ i che abʼewo ewo amo̩ma Amo̩n chaka. Taku Defid kpai amone̩-wñ chaka mudabi wa Je̩rusale̩m.
